Type.Name: Global
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

Docs.summary: Global API elements for . Most of these are utility functions.
Splits a list of filename strings and normalizes their paths.
Docs.remarks: In the underlying C implementation, the string returned is intended as an argument to g_strfreev.

Docs.summary: Trims leading and trailing whitespace from a string.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void GetLogAttrs (string text, int level, Pango.Language language, Pango.LogAttr log_attrs, int attrs_len);

Docs.summary: Computes a for each character in .
Docs.param: array with one PangoLogAttr per character in text, plus one extra, to be filled in
Docs.remarks: The array must have one for each position in text; if text contains N characters, it has N+1 positions, including the last position at the end of the text. text should be an entire paragraph; logical attributes cannot be computed without context (for example you need to see spaces on either side of a word to know the word is a word).

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ParseWeight (string str, out Pango.Weight weight, bool warn);

Docs.summary: Parses a string into a object.
Docs.param: a object to set up with the weight parsed out of the string
a for whether to warn on bad input.
Docs.returns: a for whether the string was successfully parsed.
Docs.remarks: The allowed values are "heavy", "ultrabold", "bold", "normal", "light", "ultralight" and integers. Case variations are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ParseStretch (string str, out Pango.Stretch stretch, bool warn);

Docs.summary: Parses a string into a object.
Docs.param: a to set up with the stretch value parsed out of the string
a for whether to warn on bad input.
Docs.returns: a for whether the string was successfully parsed.
Docs.remarks: The allowed values are "ultra_condensed", "extra_condensed", "condensed", "semi_condensed", "normal", "semi_expanded", "expanded", "extra_expanded" and "ultra_expanded". Case variations are ignored and the '_' characters may be omitted.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ParseVariant (string str, out Pango.Variant variant, bool warn);

Docs.summary: Parses a string into a object.
Docs.param: a to set up with the variant value parsed out of the string
a for whether to warn on bad input.
Docs.returns: a for whether the string was successfully parsed.
Docs.remarks: The allowed values are "normal" and "smallcaps" or "small_caps", case variations being ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ParseStyle (string str, out Pango.Style style, bool warn);

Docs.summary: Parses a string into a object.
Docs.param: a to set up with the style parsed out of the string.
a for whether to warn on bad input.
Docs.returns: a for whether the string was successfully parsed.
Docs.remarks: The allowed values are "normal", "italic" and "oblique", case variations being ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void FindParagraphBoundary (string text, out int paragraph_delimiter_index, out int next_paragraph_start);

Docs.param: return location for index of delimiter
return location for start of next paragraph
Docs.remarks:
A boundary is caused by delimiter characters, such as a newline, carriage return, carriage return-newline pair, or Unicode paragraph separator character. The index of the run of delimiters is returned in . The index of the start of the paragraph (index after all delimiters) is stored in .
If no delimiters are found, both and are filled with the length of text (an index one off the end).

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ScanInt (string pos, out int out_param);

Docs.summary: Scans a string looking for an integer. An integer consists of up to 31 decimal digits.
Docs.param: a , an integer to put the result into.
Docs.returns: a , false if a parse error occurred.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool SkipSpace (ref string pos);

Docs.summary: Skips 0 or more characters of whitespace
Docs.returns: a , which is true if there are non-whitespace characters before the end of the string.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ScanInt (ref string pos, out int out_param);

Docs.summary: Scans a string looking for an integer. An integer consists of up to 31 decimal digits.

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool ParseMarkup (string markup, char accel_marker, out Pango.AttrList attrs, out string text, out char accel_char);

Docs.summary: Parses a markup text string into text and a list of attributes.
